adept.module
Interface IModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractModule, AcousticInteractionAnalyzer, AnomalousTextDetector, CommittedBeliefTagger, ConversationAnnotator, CoreferenceResolver, EntityMentionDetector, EventCoreferenceResolver, JointCoreferenceRelationExtractor, NamedEntityTagger, NoveltyDetector, OpinionTagger, PosTagger, RelationExtractor, SarcasmDetector, SentenceSimilarityDetector, SocialEventExtractor, SpeechSegmentor, SyntacticChunker, TextualEntailmentDetector, UncertaintyDetector
public interface IModule

The Interface IModule defines the interfaces that are generic across all the ADEPT algorithm modules.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getModuleTraits

ModuleTraits getModuleTraits()
                             throws AdeptModuleException
Get the ModuleTraits object that describes the behavior of the underlying algorithm.

Returns:
the module traits
Throws:
AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception

activate

void activate(String configFilePath)
              throws InvalidPropertiesFormatException,
                     IOException,
                     AdeptModuleException
Activate. Activates the algorithm and perform one or more following tasks: 1. Parse the config and initialize member variables 2. Allocate memory for buffers, lists, maps, etc. 3. Set up database connections and file I/O pointers

Parameters:
configFilePath - the config file path
Throws:
InvalidPropertiesFormatException - the invalid properties format exception
IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception

getModuleConfig

ModuleConfig getModuleConfig()
                             throws AdeptModuleException
Get the module configurations object that contains key-value properties for the module.

Returns:
the module config
Throws:
AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception

deactivate

void deactivate()
                throws AdeptModuleException
Deactivate. This method will signal a shutdown to the algorithm. All the allocated members and connections will be cleared through this invocation.

Throws:
AdeptModuleException - the adept module exception
